verses.verse: <S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G50>know,<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> (for I am <S%G2980>speaking<s%> to those who <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>), that the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2961>has<s%> <S%G2961>jurisdiction<s%> <S%G2961>over<s%> a <S%G444>person<s%> as <S%G5550>long<s%> as he <S%G2198>lives<s%>?

For the <S%G5220>married<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> is <S%G1210>bound<s%> by <S%G3551>law<s%> to her <S%G435>husband<s%> while he is <S%G2198>living;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G599>dies,<s%> she is <S%G2673>released<s%> from the <S%G3551>law<s%> concerning the <S%G435>husband.<s%>

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G1437>if,<s%> while her <S%G435>husband<s%> is <S%G2198>living,<s%> she is <S%G1096>joined<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> she shall be <S%G5537>called<s%> an <S%G3428>adulteress;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G599>dies,<s%> she is <S%G1658>free<s%> from the <S%G3551>law,<s%> so that she is not an <S%G3428>adulteress,<s%> though she is <S%G1096>joined<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore,<s%> my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G2289>made<s%> to <S%G2289>die<s%> to the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that you might be <S%G1096>joined<s%> to <S%G2087>another,<s%> to Him who was <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> that we might <S%G2592>bear<s%> <S%G2592>fruit<s%> for <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G3753>while<s%> we were in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> the <S%G266>sinful<s%> <S%G3804>passions,<s%> which were [aroused] by the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> were at <S%G1754>work<s%> in the <S%G3196>members<s%> of our body to <S%G2592>bear<s%> <S%G2592>fruit<s%> for <S%G2288>death.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> we have been <S%G2673>released<s%> from the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> having <S%G599>died<s%> to that by <S%G3739>which<s%> we were <S%G2722>bound,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that we <S%G1398>serve<s%> in <S%G2538>newness<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> and not in <S%G3821>oldness<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Is the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! On the <S%G235>contrary,<s%> I would not have come to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>Law;<s%> for I would not have <S%G3609>known<s%> <S%G3609>about<s%> <S%G1939>coveting<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> had not <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You shall not <S%G1937>covet.<s%>"

But <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G874>opportunity<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G2716>produced<s%> in me <S%G1939>coveting<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>kind;<s%> for <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> [is] <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

And I was <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G3551>Law;<s%> but when the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G326>became<s%> <S%G326>alive,<s%> and I <S%G599>died;<s%>
and <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> which was to <S%G1519>result<s%> in <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2147>proved<s%> to <S%G1519>result<s%> in <S%G2288>death<s%> for me;
for <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G874>opportunity<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G1818>deceived<s%> me, and <S%G1223>through<s%> it <S%G615>killed<s%> me.
<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then,<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> is <S%G40>holy,<s%> and the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous<s%> and <S%G18>good.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> did that <S%G18>which<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> [a cause of] <S%G2288>death<s%> for me? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! <S%G235>Rather<s%> it was <S%G266>sin,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that it might be <S%G5316>shown<s%> to be <S%G266>sin<s%> by <S%G2716>effecting<s%> my <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> that <S%G18>which<s%> is <S%G18>good,<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5236>utterly<s%> <S%G266>sinful.<s%>
For we <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G3551>Law<s%> is <S%G4152>spiritual;<s%> but I <S%G1510>am<s%> of <S%G4560>flesh,<s%> <S%G4097>sold<s%> into bondage to <S%G266>sin.<s%>

For that <S%G3739>which<s%> I am <S%G2716>doing,<s%> I do not <S%G1097>understand;<s%> for I am not <S%G4238>practicing<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I [would] <S%G2309>like<s%> to [do,] but I am <S%G4160>doing<s%> the <S%G3778>very<s%> <S%G3739>thing<s%> I <S%G3404>hate.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G3778>very<s%> <S%G3778>thing<s%> I do not <S%G2309>wish<s%> [to do], I <S%G4852>agree<s%> with the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> [confessing] that it is <S%G2570>good.<s%>
<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G3570>now,<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> am I the one <S%G2716>doing<s%> it, but <S%G266>sin<s%> which <S%G1774>indwells<s%> me.

For I <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in me, that is, in my <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> for the <S%G2309>wishing<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> in me, but the <S%G2716>doing<s%> of the <S%G2570>good<s%> [is] not.
For the <S%G18>good<s%> that I <S%G2309>wish,<s%> I do not <S%G4160>do;<s%> but I <S%G4238>practice<s%> the <S%G3778>very<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> that I do not <S%G2309>wish.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> I am <S%G4160>doing<s%> the <S%G3778>very<s%> <S%G3778>thing<s%> I do not <S%G2309>wish,<s%> I am <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> the one <S%G2716>doing<s%> it, but <S%G266>sin<s%> which <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in me.
I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> the <S%G3551>principle<s%> that <S%G2556>evil<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> in me, the one who <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good.<s%>
For I <S%G4913>joyfully<s%> <S%G4913>concur<s%> with the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G2080>inner<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%>

but I <S%G991>see<s%> a <S%G2087>different<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> in the <S%G3196>members<s%> of my body, <S%G497>waging<s%> <S%G497>war<s%> <S%G497>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of my <S%G3563>mind,<s%> and <S%G163>making<s%> me a <S%G163>prisoner<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> which is in my <S%G3196>members.<s%>
<S%G5005>Wretched<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that I am! <S%G5101>Who<s%> will <S%G4506>set<s%> me <S%G4506>free<s%> from the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>?

<S%G5485>Thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> <S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then,<s%> on the <S%G3303>one<s%> <S%G3303>hand<s%> I <S%G846>myself<s%> with my <S%G3563>mind<s%> am <S%G1398>serving<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but on the <S%G1161>other,<s%> with my <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>
